# solana_recent_performance_samples (Data Source)

[(JSON RPC)](https://solana.com/docs/rpc/http/getrecentperformancesamples) Get a list of recent performance samples, in reverse slot order.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic Usage
data "solana_recent_performance_samples" "testnet" {
  amount = 5
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **amount** (Number) The amount of samples to return (default: 2, max: 720).
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **samples** (List of Object) The list of performance samples. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--samples))

<a id="nestedatt--samples"></a>
### Nested Schema for `samples`

Read-Only:

- **num_slots** (Number)
- **num_transactions** (Number)
- **sample_period_seconds** (Number)
- **slot** (Number)
